评论概述: I wanted to love this, but the design flaw ruined it for me :(
评论详情: THE PROS: This sweatshirt is a beautiful color, definitely oversized as the listing states, and is nice and soft right out of the package.  THE CONS: The imaging has a design flaw- if you look closely, some of the stars are not complete, and half of the points are missing. I know that might not be a dealbreaker for some, but for me and my OCD, it was and I was disappointed. Also, the zipper is very cheap - I do not see it lasting extensice wear, and therefore I ultimately decided to return it.
True to the picture. Worth the purchase xoxo
